name: Fight as One
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may perform the primary action on one of your resolved skill cards, targeting a different unit.

name: Follow Along
text:
Target a hero adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may perform the primary action on one of your resolved skill cards, targeting a different unit.

name: Diversionary Strike
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Move Pyro up to 2 spaces.

name: All Aboard
text: Swap Pyro in range with yourself or with a friendly hero in range.

name: Fiery Breath
text: An enemy hero in range of Pyro and in a straight line from Pyro discards a card, if able.

name: Diversionary Attack
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Move Pyro up to 3 spaces.

name: Airborne Attack
text: Before the attack: You may swap with Pyro in radius. Target a unit adjacent to you.

name: Diversionary Assault
text:
Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: Move Pyro up to 4 spaces.

name: Airborne Assault
text:
Before the attack: You may swap with Pyro in radius. Target a unit adjacent to you.
After the attack: You may swap with Pyro in radius.

name: Take-Off
text: Swap Pyro in range with yourself or with a friendly hero in range.

name: Drag Off
text: Move both Pyro, and an enemy unit adjacent to Pyro, either 2 or 3 spaces each, in the same direction.

name: Safe Landing
text:

Swap Pyro in range with yourself or with a friendly hero in range.

text: Move both Pyro, and an enemy unit adjacent to Pyro, either 2 or 3 spaces each, in the same direction, ignoring obstacles.

name: Flaming Breath
text: An enemy hero in range of Pyro and in a straight line from Pyro discards a card, if able.
